alert.note: Alert for Pope County Higher Elevations; Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:35PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Van Buren and northeastern Pope Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 435 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dabney, or 20 miles west of Clinton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dabney... Alread... Brock Creek Campground... Rupert... Crabtree... Scotland... Mountain Man Trailhead... Nogo... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pope County Higher Elevations; Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
